original_text: Son of man, I will soon take away from them Jerusalem's great temple. It is the beautiful place that has made them very happy. They are very proud of it. They love to look at it. I will also take away their sons and daughters.
korean_text: 인자야 내가 그 힘과 그 즐거워하는 영광과 그 눈이 기뻐하는 것과 그 마음이 간절하게 생각하는 자녀를 데려가는 날

sentences.original_text: I will soon take away from them Jerusalem's great temple
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 곧 그들에게서 예루살렘의 위대한 성전을 빼앗을 것이다

sentences.original_text: that has made them very happy
They are very proud of it
They love to look at it
I will also take away their sons and daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 그들의 아들들과 딸들을 빼앗을 것이다
